about_the_game: The Zero-K server runs off generous donations and we hope stay online for many years to come. Bronze supporters receive a bronze forum badge as well as enough kudos to unlock a clan icon or commander skin through the Edit Commander site link in the game menu.
detailed_description: The Zero-K server runs off generous donations and we hope stay online for many years to come. Bronze supporters receive a bronze forum badge as well as enough kudos to unlock a clan icon or commander skin through the Edit Commander site link in the game menu.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 or equivalent
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz dual core CPU with SSE (Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB graphics card with OpenGL 3 support (GeForce 8800 or equivalent)
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 17.10 or equivalent
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz quad core CPU (Intel Core i5 or equivalent)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2048 MB graphics card with OpenGL 3 support (high GT 500 series or equivalent)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
